titles: The art of rhetoric, with A discourse of the laws of England by Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury.
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
notes: "A dialogue between a phylosopher and a student, of the common-laws of England" has separate collation.
"The art of rhetorick plainly set forth, with pertinent examples" (p. [135]-168) has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
